description: This file defines a Preferences class that acts as a wrapper around the SharedPreferences package for managing token storage using key-value pairs.

classes.name: Preferences
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to store, retrieve, and clear access and refresh tokens using SharedPreferences.

methods.name: setAccessToken
methods.description: Stores the access token string in shared preferences.

methods.name: getAccessToken
methods.description: Retrieves the stored access token string from shared preferences.

methods.name: clearAccessToken
methods.description: Removes the stored access token from shared preferences.

methods.name: setRefreshToken
methods.description: Stores the refresh token string in shared preferences.

methods.name: getRefreshToken
methods.description: Retrieves the stored refresh token string from shared preferences.

methods.name: clearRefreshToken
methods.description: Removes the stored refresh token from shared preferences.

methods.name: clearAll
methods.description: Clears all data stored in shared preferences.
